comments:

I need to know which rule you were trying to quickfix.  Any idea which rule the result came from?

I got it trying to apply a quickfix for "Avoid catching a checked exception that is not thrown within the try{} block".

1) Checkout org.eclipse.jdt.core from CVS
2) Run the Analysis on this project selecting all rules
3) Stop it after a while because your .log is swamped with:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.tptp.platform.analysis.core 4 4 2006-04-27 13:50:23.235
!MESSAGE IWAT0482E Invalid node for rule filter
satisfiesReturnType:org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.MethodDeclaration

4) Go to the Analysis result view and select the first result under:
"Avoid catching a checked exception that is not thrown within the try{} block".
5) try quick fix.
I think you are seeing this because Calisto packages a build of TPTP that is a few weeks old.  This problem should be fixed once the calisto build is updated.
